findings.description:
LedgerChannel.consensusCloseChannel(bytes32,uint256,uint256[4],string,string) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#613-691) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- Channels[_lcID].partyAddresses[0].transfer(_balances[0]) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#660)
	- Channels[_lcID].partyAddresses[1].transfer(_balances[1]) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#661)

ECTools.toEthereumSignedMessage(string) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#152-159) calls abi.encodePacked() with multiple dynamic arguments:
	- keccak256()(abi.encodePacked(prefix,uintToString(len),_msg)) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#158)

Reentrancy in LedgerChannel.byzantineCloseChannel(bytes32) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#966-1045):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(channel.token.transfer(channel.partyAddresses[0],tokenbalanceA),byzantineCloseChannel: token transfer failure) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#1018-1024)
	- require(bool,string)(channel.token.transfer(channel.partyAddresses[1],tokenbalanceI),byzantineCloseChannel: token transfer failure) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#1025-1031)
	External calls sending eth:
	- channel.partyAddresses[0].transfer(ethbalanceA) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#1013)
	- channel.partyAddresses[1].transfer(ethbalanceI) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#1014)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- channel.isOpen = false (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#1034)
	LedgerChannel.Channels (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#421) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- LedgerChannel.Channels (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#421)
	- LedgerChannel.LCOpenTimeout(bytes32) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#484-517)
	- LedgerChannel.byzantineCloseChannel(bytes32) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#966-1045)
	- LedgerChannel.closeVirtualChannel(bytes32,bytes32) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#914-964)
	- LedgerChannel.consensusCloseChannel(bytes32,uint256,uint256[4],string,string) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#613-691)
	- LedgerChannel.createChannel(bytes32,address,uint256,address,uint256[2]) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#423-482)
	- LedgerChannel.deposit(bytes32,address,uint256,bool) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#553-611)
	- LedgerChannel.getChannel(bytes32) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#1071-1106)
	- LedgerChannel.initVCstate(bytes32,bytes32,bytes,address,address,uint256[2],uint256[4],string) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#768-832)
	- LedgerChannel.joinChannel(bytes32,uint256[2]) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#519-550)
	- LedgerChannel.settleVC(bytes32,bytes32,uint256,address,address,uint256[4],string) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#835-912)
	- LedgerChannel.updateLCstate(bytes32,uint256[6],bytes32,string,string) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#695-765)

Reentrancy in LedgerChannel.LCOpenTimeout(bytes32) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#484-517):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(Channels[_lcID].token.transfer(Channels[_lcID].partyAddresses[0],Channels[_lcID].erc20Balances[0]),CreateChannel: token transfer failure) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#497-503)
	External calls sending eth:
	- Channels[_lcID].partyAddresses[0].transfer(Channels[_lcID].ethBalances[0]) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#492-494)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- delete Channels[_lcID] (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#516)
	LedgerChannel.Channels (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#421) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- LedgerChannel.Channels (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#421)
	- LedgerChannel.LCOpenTimeout(bytes32) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#484-517)
	- LedgerChannel.byzantineCloseChannel(bytes32) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#966-1045)
	- LedgerChannel.closeVirtualChannel(bytes32,bytes32) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#914-964)
	- LedgerChannel.consensusCloseChannel(bytes32,uint256,uint256[4],string,string) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#613-691)
	- LedgerChannel.createChannel(bytes32,address,uint256,address,uint256[2]) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#423-482)
	- LedgerChannel.deposit(bytes32,address,uint256,bool) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#553-611)
	- LedgerChannel.getChannel(bytes32) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#1071-1106)
	- LedgerChannel.initVCstate(bytes32,bytes32,bytes,address,address,uint256[2],uint256[4],string) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#768-832)
	- LedgerChannel.joinChannel(bytes32,uint256[2]) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#519-550)
	- LedgerChannel.settleVC(bytes32,bytes32,uint256,address,address,uint256[4],string) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#835-912)
	- LedgerChannel.updateLCstate(bytes32,uint256[6],bytes32,string,string) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#695-765)
LedgerChannel._isContained(bytes32,bytes,bytes32) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#1047-1068) is declared view but contains assembly code
ECTools.recoverSigner(bytes32,string) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#66-95) is declared view but contains assembly code
ECTools.uintToBytes32(uint256) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#143-148) is declared view but contains assembly code

LedgerChannel.consensusCloseChannel(bytes32,uint256,uint256[4],string,string) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#613-691) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(totalTokenDeposit == _balances[2] + _balances[3]) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#630)

LedgerChannel.consensusCloseChannel(bytes32,uint256,uint256[4],string,string) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#613-691) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(Channels[_lcID].isOpen == true) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#622)

LedgerChannel.joinChannel(bytes32,uint256[2]) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#519-550) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(Channels[_lcID].isOpen == false) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#521)

LedgerChannel.initVCstate(bytes32,bytes32,bytes,address,address,uint256[2],uint256[4],string) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#768-832) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(_isContained(_initState,_proof,Channels[_lcID].VCrootHash) == true) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#805-807)

LedgerChannel.deposit(bytes32,address,uint256,bool) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#553-611) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool,string)(Channels[_lcID].isOpen == true,Tried adding funds to a closed channel) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#559-562)

elements.name: require(bool,string)(Channels[_lcID].isOpen == true,Tried adding funds to a closed channel)

findings.description:
LedgerChannel.LCOpenTimeout(bytes32) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#484-517) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(msg.sender == Channels[_lcID].partyAddresses[0] && Channels[_lcID].isOpen == false) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#485-488)

LedgerChannel.consensusCloseChannel(bytes32,uint256,uint256[4],string,string) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#613-691) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(totalEthDeposit == _balances[0] + _balances[1]) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#629)

LedgerChannel._isContained(bytes32,bytes,bytes32) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#1047-1068) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- cursor == _root (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#1067)

	- Channels[_lcID].erc20Balances[2] += _balance (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#580)

	- LedgerChannel.createChannel(bytes32,address,uint256,address,uint256[2]) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#423-482)
	- LedgerChannel.deposit(bytes32,address,uint256,bool) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_024.sol#553-611)
